blog.description: My personal blog where I share thoughts on technology, servers, cloud, and a bit of my daily life. I started my journey in 2018 and have been exploring and learning ever since. If you’re into database, runners, or just want to read some thoughts on tech and life, check it out!

messages.0: Hi! I'm Yue, your virtual assistant! Need help navigating?
messages.1: Did you know you can activate the retro mode with the Konami Code?
messages.3: Hey, I found a hidden easter egg! Want to see?
messages.4: Don't forget to check out my creator, Yuri's latest projects!
messages.5: Welcome to the website! How can I help you today?
messages.6: Feel free to explore around! There's lots to discover.
messages.7: Need to get in touch? Check out the contact section!
messages.8: Did you know this site is built with Next.js and TypeScript?
messages.9: Thanks for visiting! Hope you're having a great day!
messages.10: Want to see what my creator, Yuri is working on? Check out the projects!
messages.11: I love helping visitors and sharing knowledge. What about you?
messages.12: Dark mode or light mode? I support both!
messages.13: This website is fully responsive. Try resizing your browser!
messages.14: Found any bugs? Let me know and I'll help report them!
messages.15: I'm always learning new things from my creator, Yuri. What's your latest discovery?

messages.17: I can help you find anything on the site!

messages.27: I'm here to help make your experience better!
messages.28: My creator, Yuri loves sharing knowledge through the blog.
